sn34.17:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco jhayi samadhismim samapattikusalo hoti, na samadhismim sakkaccakari.
sn34.17:1.5: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhayi samadhismim sakkaccakari hoti, na samadhismim samapattikusalo.
sn34.17:1.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhayi neva samadhismim samapattikusalo hoti, na ca samadhismim sakkaccakari.
sn34.17:1.7: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhayi samadhismim samapattikusalo ca hoti, samadhismim sakkaccakari ca.
